Scroll breaker

Process

Modern-day online and on-device experiences can be, as discussed in this post, addictive.

As discussed in this post, we can, however, choose how we use these technologies. In particular, we can choose to use these technologies with awareness and intentionality, breaking us out of addictive cycles and changing the technologies to be less addictive.

To help with this, I have created a collection of accounts that prompt us to be aware and intentional. The variety of prompts are generated programmatically with the help of a Large Language Model.

Acknowledgments: ChatGPT (OpenAI)

Influences: Fear by Thich Nhat Hanh, work by Jonathan Haidt, research by Jonathan Stray
